price: Wͻpε sε wͻde wͻn ano dum Nyankopͻn nhyerεnee no, nanso Nyankopͻn bεma Nenhyerεnee no atim, sε boniayεfoͻ no mpε mpo a.
arabic: يُرِيدُونَ لِيُطۡفِـُٔواْ نُورَ ٱللَّهِ بِأَفۡوَٰهِهِمۡ وَٱللَّهُ مُتِمُّ نُورِهِۦ وَلَوۡ كَرِهَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: yurīdūna liyuṭ'fiū nūra al-lahi bi-afwāhihim wal-lahu mutimmu nūrihi walaw kariha al-kāfirūna
